name: Flat Cube: 2D Cube Puzzle
description:
Most Addictive PUZZLE GAME "Flat Cube!"

We made the real 3D Cube mobile!
This is 2D version of 3D Cube Puzzle.

Swipe Box And Match Color!
If you do well, try challenging cubes like 5X5, 6X6.
Even that easy? Can you clear the picture puzzle then?


· · · · · · · Game Feature · · · · · · ·

Compete with your friends and global players!
How fast can you break the stage?

» Simple Swipe Control
» Choose puzzles of various difficulty levels
» More than 30 beautiful photos puzzle
» Endless challenge, overcome your BEST TIME

Developer - Best Indie Developer MondayOFF Game
